name: robotChaos
description:
an small fps

Lore/Story

a robot making compony has teamed up with a terrorism group to destroy the world

the compony has sent some robots to the terrorism group department as a gift

you the secret under cover agent must destroy as many robots as you can in order to make chaos between the compony and the group(because if you destroy the robots the compony will think the terrorism group did so they will get angry).

Controls

E to drop or pick up guns

R to reload

left click on your mouse to shoot

a and d and w and s keys to move

Important details

there are 3 Guns in the map

an ar -15, a pistol , a shotgun

also:

  if you are running low on shields you can use the shield power ups scattered around the map
